Summary: My Aunt Flo Sees A Light In The Sky
trends: There have been 7 other sightings in Hoffman Estates
There were no other sightings in Hoffman Estates on or around February 28th 1983
divs: Sighting DetailsThis is a second hand story that was told by my Aunt Flo from long time ago. My Aunt Flo has what she thinks, this was supposedly to be a close encounter of the third kind, when she was startled when a brilliant bright light up in the sky while she was in the storeroom of her own diner that shad used to own back during the 1970s. She had heard a strange sound and she had rushed out of the backdoor and then she apparently sees a UFO. However, my Aunt Flo was having a hard time convincing everyone of what she saw, while My Uncle Melvin does his best to try to capitalize when Aunt Flo becomes a local celebrity in Hoffman Estates IL.
